abbreviations.context_text: AP-4-associated HSP affects males and females of ethnic groups from around the world. The prevalence of AP-4-HSP is unknown. AP-4-HSP is likely under-recognized since the symptoms (phenotypic spectrum) largely overlap with that of cerebral palsy and, in the absence of genetic testing, patients may be misdiagnosed as h
